alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lake and north central Cook Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 959 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Park Ridge, moving north northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Evanston, Skokie, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Glenview, Ohare Airport, Wheeling, Park Ridge, Northbrook, Elk Grove Village, Niles, West Ridge, Irving Park, Highland Park, Wilmette, Lake Forest, Franklin Park, Norridge and Belmont Cragin. Including the following interstates... I-90 between mile markers 73 and 84. I-94 between mile markers 23 and 44. I-294 between mile markers 23 and 44. This includes... Oakton Community College, Lake Forest College, Northeastern Illinois University, Northwestern University, and Ravinia Music Festival. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
